keyword: how many calories are in an ear of corn
title: How Many Calories Are in an Ear of Corn?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in an ear of corn, including carbs, protein, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown per ear with easy tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories Are in an Ear of Corn?
assumptions: Medium ear of corn (~90 g kernels), yellow sweet corn, boiled or steamed, no added butter, salt, or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by corn variety, size, freshness, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium ear of corn provides about 90 kcal and 3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in an ear of corn?
faqs.a: About 90 kcal for one medium ear of boiled sweet corn.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in an ear of corn?
faqs.a: Approximately 19 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 6 g sugars.
No, one ear has about 3 g protein; it's mostly carbs.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in corn?
faqs.a: Boiling or steaming adds minimal calories; grilling may add a few if charred.

faqs.q: Does adding butter change the calories much?
faqs.a: Yes, 1 tbsp butter adds ~100 kcal per ear.
